modName: SxS CBBEv3 Curvy - Swimsuit design resource
summary: 45 base swimsuit designs for CBBEv3 Curvy (weight 0 only, as is, a modders resource).
descriptionHtml:
After my work with Nereid Pirate I wanted to create a swimsuit collection.
Many designs came up, different ideas and tested for weight 0.
But... as I have decided to stop modding I have not completed all designs,
there might be issues and I have made weight 0 only.

I therefore release this to the community with source files for anyone
to use and/or build upon to create something else.

SxS is just this mods working title.

The package contains a total of 45 designs, all with blend files and
all are avaible (as weight 0) in game.

Important notes:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
It has been designed for CBBEv3 Curvy.

Included in this package is actually working models inside the game but
for weight 0 only as I haven't made conversions for weight 1.
I have it in place for playtesting.

The texture is simply a 4K texture used as a base for all suits.

Only way to obtain them is through the console. Type help "sxs" to get the IDs.


Final words:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The journey from never using a 3D model program to this point has been really fun
and I have learned a lot.
Still see myself as mediocre model maker and have much to learn still but I have
decided not to pursue this path any further.
It's been as a hobby only while I still have Skyrim installed I am moving away from
it and I don't see myself creating something for other games, at least not as involved as I have
been with this title.
The community i general is a great one and I hope it will keep being great in the future.

I will not be a stranger here on Nexus but how much I visit or engage myself, only the future can tell :)
author: BBDrac
